snippet: ARNOLDS FIRST LATIN BOOK, remodeled and rewritten and adapted to the Ollendorff method of instruction. BY ALBERT HARKNESS, Senior Master of the Providence High School. D. Appleton  Co., No. 200 Broadway....
lead_paragraph: ARNOLDS FIRST LATIN BOOK, remodeled and rewritten and adapted to the Ollendorff method of instruction. BY ALBERT HARKNESS, Senior Master of the Providence High School. D. Appleton Co., No. 200 Broadway.
